extendedInfo.description: Cloudacl Safe Web Browser is cloud based content filtering safe web browser which monitoring millions websites and billion of webpages to keep you family especially your kids have a safer internet surfing environment.Cloudacl Safe Web Browser has the following features:===â Anti Porn, Anti Adult content websiteâ Anti Abused Drugs including Marijuanaâ Anti online game to block the popular game related websiteâ Anti Violation,  gambling  or gun related website or forumsâ Anti social networking to block popular website like facebook.com and twitter.comâ Anti spyware and virus web siteâ Anti anonymous proxy web site to bypass firewall or parental control softwareâ Anti spam web site used to sending most of the spam email in the internetThe following 9 security categories are supported in the blocking setup.====â Sites hosting spyware, virus, fishing & fraudsâ Adult sites including adult content, sex, nudityâ Sites related abused drugs & Marijuanaâ Bandwidth consuming sites peer2peer, online storageâ Sites including weapon, gambling, questionableâ Online gaming sitesâ Online sites used as proxy serverâ Sites used for spammingâ Social-networking, dating and media streamingSetup admin or parent password:==0. open safe browser application1. click the configuration button on your phone2. click admin icon in the configuration menu3. type your password, then click Ok4. now your are in parent or admin mode5. do step #1 again to configure your security policyIn admin mode, you can configure the categories and sites you want to block, in normal (restricted) mode, you can only browse sites allowed.How to set safe browser as your default browser===1. Click menu button, select "Manage apps"2. Select "Browser" (which means your Android default browser)3. Click "Clear defaults"4. Follow the instuction "If no default browser setting"5. Click Home button to exist app manager6. Click the browser icon on the status bar7. Browser list window will pop up8. Check "Use by default for this action", and then click "Safe Browser" to set default browserWhen you visit a new category which is not in the Cloudacl WebFilter addon database, your browser will query Cloudacl cloud service for the visiting URL which addressed in our privacy policy on our website:   http://cloudacl.com/privacy_policy.htmlour website:  http://cloudacl.comIf you have any question, please contact us at info@cloudacl.com

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: This is a great app. Only one thing would make it better is if there was a way you could have a password set up for like your accountability partner so we couldn\'t delete or change it the browser. Evo 3d
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: False security
reviews.comment: Basically useless. Allows Tumblr, torrent trackers, all of Wikipedia, chan boards like 7chan, Encyclopedia Dramatica, offbeat XXX streaming video sites, filter circumvention sites, .etc .etc. It\'s not 1998. Blocking pay site and shock site URLs is just false security.
reviews.author: john reeves

reviews.title: Exilant
reviews.comment: Best web filter services, and free as well. I had this program on my home computer and worked pretty we\'ll. I am happy to finally get the android version
reviews.author: narendra singh

reviews.title: I dont recommend this app
reviews.comment: Its ok but also annoying cuz i cnt refresh or even view tabs separately.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Weak
reviews.comment: Well, you can set it as the default browser, but how is web filtering supposed to work if you can just open Chrome or the default browser. This is no sort of web protection, it is just another browser.
reviews.author: Ben Kloepfer

reviews.title: Works, but please update...
reviews.comment: This browser works/blocks well, even after upgrading to ICS.  But, it would be great if it had the option to view websites in desktop mode and not only the mobile version all the time. The bundled browser has this option, but I have it blocked \'cause it\'s not filtered.  I want the filter AND the desktop view.  Tabs would be nice, too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good filter but
reviews.comment: 1 why does the admin need be AT a poor site in order to block it and 2 why the pre-installed list of poor websites which are already blocked? Just giving the list for reference when on an unblocked PC?  I\'ll keep your filtered browser and there are still improvements to be had.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: This is a pretty decent app, the browser slows down my phone a bit and even though I have certain content blocked there are ways around it. Also, I cannot view the history or have multiple windows open.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: good but needs 1: browser history so that we know for sure that its working. 2: ability to block out other web browsers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
reviews.comment: Pointless app. You can still get on the original web browser and these settings have no  effect. Can you please put the option in here to redirect other web browsers to this one? Will rate 5 stars if you do. Also make these settings affect Google play. ..not to block it completely. ..just family filter for safe browsing.  Google play has a family filter but it cannot be password protected.
reviews.author: Micah Smith

reviews.title: Horrible.
reviews.comment: Fix the about.blank bug, on Samsung Galaxy Tab 2, that causes all web addresses after clicking on a link, to be about.blank.  So annoying!!
reviews.author: Bryan Hepburn

reviews.title: Makes An Excellent Streaming Video Downloader
reviews.comment: Depending on settings its ok for blocking sites, but if you want to use it to stream videos, it wont play them it will download them instead!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The heck is this?
reviews.comment: If I type F for Facebook in the browser, smart browser here will start loading a whole bunch of pornographic sites that include a letter F as if that\'s what I was trying to find. I have discovered more disgusting websites than I ever knew existed just by typing in single letters and watching this app try to guess what I want. This is horrible.
reviews.author: Julian Humphrey

reviews.title: Needs image filtering
reviews.comment: Love the app! But seriously needs image app. And also a way to text or email an accountability partner if such content is searched.
reviews.author: Demetria Patterson

reviews.title: Complete rubish!
reviews.comment: This app blocks nothing accept normal usage. My kid was still able to look up porn and watch videos
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: I found this very helpful. 2nd request, find a way to stop inappropriate linking ad pages. Tube splash/ large porn tube etc. Great that the links from these pages are blocked but the front contents pages are full of images. Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Last update has been horrible
reviews.comment: It won\'t even connect to the internet for me anymore. It\'s just ridiculous
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful app!
reviews.comment: Nice to browse and not worry about unGodly things popping up!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good browser but missing some functionality
reviews.comment: I love this app. It had a great admin system for content control and for customisation. My only problem is that I cannot seem to press and hold an image to download an image or text/audio file to my phone. Please fix this and I\'ll give 5 stars.  I love this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: Great app, amazing idea, badly done. Its very slow, noticeably slower than other browsers. But that was ok. Worth it. But it force closes on every site! Its impossible to work with because of that. Uninstalling. Look for a better alternative, this app isn\'t worth your time.
reviews.author: A Google User
